resources.string: Some practices to follow while using CLATS :\n

Press the refresh button at regular intervals, to know the update.


Check the "I am riding/lending the cycle" checkbox only when the cycle is being taken outside the campus.


Do not reveal your cycle number or password to anybody.


Do uncheck the "I am riding/lending the cycle" checkbox after your cycle is returned, or after you complete your ride.
1) CLATS shows that my cycle is at a certain location, but it is not there. Where is it then?
Ans : Search the specified location thoroughly. If still now found, you have to search the routes between the locations adjacent to your specified locations.\n\n
Ans : Please contact us. Phone number 9661677255/9959935378/8465890325.\n\n
3) How do I delete my account?
Ans : We do not give you the previliges to delete your account due to security issues. Please contact us on 9661677255/9959935378/8465890325.\n\n
4) I am not able to sign up for CLATS.
Ans : You may have typed the wrong cycle number in the cycle number section. Please type the correct EPC.\n\n
5) When do I have to check the \"I\'m riding/lending the cycle\" checkbox?
Ans : Check the \"I\'m riding/lending the cycle\" checkbox only when you or anyone, whom you have lended the cycle, is taking it out of the campus. \n\n
